llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic explicitly states that a real-world disruption was better than the actual theatrical content, indicating severe disappointment with the production itself. | GPT-4o-mini: The review suggests that the only notable aspect of the play was an external disruption, indicating a complete lack of value in the production itself. | Note: Models differed by 15 points.
